alert.note: Alert for Kidder (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 1:35AM CDT until June 20 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL KIDDER AND NORTHERN BURLEIGH COUNTIES... At 134 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Regan, or 16 miles northeast of Bismarck, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Wing, Tuttle, Regan, Baldwin and Arena. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
